data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Thüringen that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thüringen, Germany
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 2,203,008 people in Thüringen who are far from you. Please add 449 new house churches this year.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Thüringen words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Thüringen, Germany.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Tunisian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Tunisian people.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Thüringen, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 2,249,900 citizens of the the state of Thüringen.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Thüringen, Germany has a population of 2,249,900.

We estimate Thüringen has 46,892 people who might know Jesus, 1,331,414 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 871,594 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,249,900 people living in Thüringen through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
